spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ilsevele is a 16th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Ilsevele has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Ilsevele has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When Ilsevele uses her action to cast a cantrip, she can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Weapon Bond
entries: Provided her longbow is on the same plane Illsevele can take a bonus action to teleport it to her hand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ilsevele makes three ranged attacks or two melee attacks. If she has a second shortsword drawn, she can make an additional shortsword attack.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: +1 Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I hope to restore my nation to its former glory. (Dream)
{@bold {@italic Personality.}} Distant (Do I know...? I don't think I do...)
{@bold {@italic Pause.}} Humming an ancient elven song with closed eyes.
{@bold {@italic Pfidget.}} Running my fingers along the table.
